div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 278 Poleme, near Marcopoulo, Attica, 1956 Burial: c. 140-130 B.C. (T) Contents: 4+ AE Athens: 3 New Style (as Svoronos pl. 24, 62 ff. [1]; pl. 81, 41 [1]; 49 [1]) 1 "Delian" type (as Sv. pl. 107, 50 ff.) Disposition: Athens Varoucha, BCH 1957, p. 498
